alert.note: Alert for Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:29PM CDT until July 26 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MORTON COUNTY... At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Lincoln, or 14 miles southeast of Bismarck, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Fort Rice, Stumpf State Natural Area and Huff. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
